V.P. CONSTRUCTION CO., INC., Steven Rilenge, and Julie Rilenge, Appellants, (Defendants/Counterclaim-Plaintiffs and Third-Party Plaintiff below),
v.
INTERIOR RENOVATION & DESIGN, INC., and Patricia A. Geisler, Appellees, (Plaintiffs/Counterclaim-Defendants and Third-Party Defendant below) Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1712-CC-2851 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED September 28, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

MAY , J.

Affirmed.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.

RILEY, J., Dissents with separate opinion.
